title: Probably the best ADC in Oceania currently AMA
body:
im free for a day, got busy schedule of ranked, ask away and i'll reply whenever i can
]]]{{champion:22}}

replies.body:
Best ADC in OCE? You're pretty good dude but best ADC is Raydere ;). Anyways here are my questions;

1. What do you think of the ADC rework that Riot has announced?

2. How reliant is an ADC on their support? Can someone truly solo carry with a absolute trash tier support?

3. What is your opinion on the new Teleport meta? Is the pressure bot lane quite hard to deal with?

4. What do you think of Kindred? Could ADC junglers become a thing?

I haven't looked at patch notes, and i don't keep up to date with new announcements, so new champion i have no idea what he/she/it does. New meta is always lame, change is always depressing, just like when they made jungle camps super strong, it still bugs me. So I can't really have a valid input on either the ADC rework or the new champion, Kindred. I do believe an ADC is extremely reliant on their support, on this account, I struggled to carry every game early because supports wouldn't peel and it made games harder. However with that being said I don't think it's ever okay to blame a support for your death, whether it be in lane or in teamfights. All your deaths are preventable by different positioning.

The teleport meta is annoying and the pressure it gives can affect the lane dramatically, however it's still fairly even if your toplaner is on the same page too. The teleport toplaners aren't a problem. Neither with the roaming mids.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EbaaHfvE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-26T23:38:38.791+0000)
>
> Best ADC in OCE? You're pretty good dude but best ADC is Raydere ;). Anyways here are my questions;
> 
> 1. What do you think of the ADC rework that Riot has announced?
> 
> 2. How reliant is an ADC on their support? Can someone truly solo carry with a absolute trash tier support?
> 
> 3. What is your opinion on the new Teleport meta? Is the pressure bot lane quite hard to deal with?
> 
> 4. What do you think of Kindred? Could ADC junglers become a thing?

4- they already are.

I've played league for about 70days in game time. For the past few months I've been maining adc as much as possible, but sometimes I feel that I can't orbwalk/stutterstep etc as well as I should be able to. Not sure if it's laziness or I need to put my mouse sensitivity up.. May I ask what mouse you own and what settings you have in place for it in regards to dpi and other possible acceleration settings. Cheers for reading, friend.

mouse speed in league set to 70%, and my dpi is 1800. No acceleration. My mouse is a Razer Naga, but I wouldn't bother getting a mouse because it doesn't affect gameplay unless you use the mouse numbers for items (ward jumping) which i dont because adc main. I use them for taunt/emote spam. 

This isn't for everyone but I've gotten used to it and it is really helpful for me, I set attack-move click to my left mouse click, right click is walk.  MB3 is to click on objects (Towers/Champions/MovingMap) Look up a guide to do that if interested as you need to do it in the configuration folders. 

At first this was a problem because if i missclicked someone i'd attack the closest thing, and being a vayne player it proved a massive problem. My accuracy became better and in the long run it is helpful, it stops me from walking into the enemy when a missclick does occur.

Thanks for the reply man. I've sped up my settings on League and one more question if you're still here. What's the speed of your camera with mouse? I'll try see if I can handle attack move on left click.
I don't know about my camera movespeed, sorry. I don't think it's very important. Try using the F-keys to inspect teammates, very helpful.
OOOOOOOOh I've been wondering what you guys press for that for ages! Thx!
6300 Dpi master race
2fast
Gotta go fast

nubs probably cant be taught. Soz. x
I heard you just got absolutely destroyed by a Master Yi. Care to comment?
Hi, I believe you're mistaken, or misheard, my friend. However I did get absolutely destroyed by a certain individual whom didn't belong at the platinum 1 mmr level.

You've used the word "probably" before "the best ADC in Oceania currently".

Is that uncertainty or modesty? :^)
Modesty, friend.
